title: Tell me who I should buy next!
body:
Okay, so I'm kind of stumped on who to buy out of Talon{{champion:91}}  or Fizz{{champion:105}} 
So, which champion should I buy first out of those two?

replies.body: "WHICH CHAMP SHOULD I BUY GUYS BOY OH BOY THERES OVER 120 TO PICK FROM" *out of these 2 assassins* every champ purchasing thread ever

Talon is easier imo but very 1-dimensional.

Fizz is little trickier but has more versatility. He can mid as well as Jungle. You can also build him tanky (although its not that good anymore).

I own both and personally I'm terrible with both. But still have a lot of fun with Fizz.

{{champion:105}}

A tip for both though. If you have trouble in mid and find yourself 0-3. Its a simple fix. Just wait til you have your first item then go bot and get a double kill. They kill ADC's and supps ridiculously fast and easy

It's up to your playstyle, both champion are assassin but one is AD and the other is AP
Talon is very mobile but his escape is questionable , on the otherhand Fizz kit make people mad since he is very slippery especially when he has a lot of CDR.
IMO : I would get Fizz because I think he is more powerful in the current meta.
